sentence: The pool towels are at reception which is not close to the pool so every time you want to change the towels you have to go all the way to reception to do this
The WiFi reception could be better I could connect from our room but I kept losing the connection
When asking for reservations at restaurants the front desk was not very helpful it really depends on the person you talk too
The Staff was either very friendly or not at all Joao at the pool bar was definitely a sunshine compared to some of the Staff in the Pizzeria at the hotel

At breakfast which by the was wonderful it was the same the lady who was checking in the guests we approached her to ask just for some plates and she said I am reception I do not get involved with that stuff yet she was standing probably 15 inches away from the food section and could easily just get some help from a colleague

only stayed since we could not afford to leave and move somewhere else after having paidno attention to detail despite complaints no soap in toilet near pool pool area got the ambience of a fridge staff not trained forgot reservation in restaurant and not even a word of excuse
The pool area had nobody at reception
The other downside was the bar staff
The receptionist refuses to greet her guests the restaurant staff does not even acknowledge their existence
no help with your luggage no decent cleaning service no reaction after complaints no knowledge on the area
Reception staff Bruno and Diana were excellent and really helpful friendly and interested in resolving issues and ensuring guests had the best experience
Very friendly helpful staff

we can not waitAlthough maybe not five star the hotel was spotlessly clean staff extremely attentive and we had a lovely room However we really missed not having tea coffee facilities in the room and also bath robes
Laura and the whole Memo Baleira Team Thank you so much for making our stay unforgettable
Everything was fresh absolutely delicious again the Restaurant staff was exceptional
Pleasant and helpful staff
Good value and a high standard of service and food
The service and the food needs to step up before I will give this hotel rating 4Stil I recommend this hotel it has many advantages
Overall I give a10 outnumbered of 10 and a big thank you to all the staff
Beautiful hotel good service friendly stuff
